title: Luciano Mellera: Infantiloide
synopsis: Argentina's Luciano Mellera emphasizes the humorous and fantastical aspects of childhood through comedic impersonations and insights on daily life.

title: Oththa Seruppu Size 7
synopsis: Taken into custody, a murder suspect's theatrical explanations of his peculiar modus operandi unearth truths far beyond the crime he’s accused of.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
synopsis: While the Civil War rages between the Union and the Confederacy, three men comb the American Southwest in search of $200,000 in stolen gold.

title: Inception
synopsis: In this mindbending sci-fi thriller, a man runs an espionage business built around entering the subconscious of his targets to steal their thoughts.

title: Mahabharat
synopsis: Two young brothers encounter a singing bird who treats them to a musical reinterpretation of one of India’s most epic ancient tales.

title: Surga Yang Tak Dirindukan
synopsis: After saving an unwed expectant mother who's injured in a car accident, a happily married man takes her as his second wife -- without telling his first.

title: Merku Thodarchi Malai
synopsis: In southern India, a laborer's dreams of owning a piece of land to farm is complicated by political corruption.

title: Sillu Karuppatti
synopsis: From first crushes to post-marriage relationships, love and connection are at the heart of the four interwoven stories in this anthology film.

title: The Matrix
synopsis: A computer hacker learns that what most people perceive as reality is actually a simulation created by machines and joins a rebellion to break free.

title: One Heart: The AR Rahman Concert Film
synopsis: In this concert film, Indian musical maestro A.R. Rahman performs 15 of his most popular songs and reveals himself through interviews and clips.

title: Devil's Bride
synopsis: On a small Finnish island in 1666, a teenage girl in love with a married fisherman becomes the center of a tragic witch hunt and power struggle.

title: Bill Hicks: Relentless
synopsis: In one of his most iconic performances, late comedian Bill Hicks demonstrates what made him such a singular talent and a force to be reckoned with.

title: Koshish
synopsis: A speech and hearing-impaired couple persists through unforgiving obstacles to be accepted by society and live a life of dignity.

title: Untamed Romania
synopsis: This documentary explores how the legendary creatures of Romania's vast wilderness roam free yet endure the ever-changing seasons.

title: Bill Hicks: Revelations
synopsis: In his final recorded special, the iconoclastic comedian channels Goat Boy and tackles provocative topics like British porn, pot and the priesthood.

title: Mallesham
synopsis: A self-trained engineer risks debt, love and reputation in his quest to improve the grueling work conditions of his mother and her weaving community.

title: Gol Maal
synopsis: When circumstances at work compel Ram to pretend to have a twin, his lie works -- until the boss wants his daughter to marry Ram’s fictitious brother.

title: Back to the Future
synopsis: Eccentric inventor Doc Brown turns a DeLorean into a time machine that inadvertently sends his young friend, Marty McFly, 30 years into the past.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
synopsis: In this epic spaghetti Western, a flinty gunslinger is hired by a railroad tycoon to kill anyone standing in the way of his trans-American iron horse.

title: The Pianist
synopsis: Famed Polish pianist Wladyslaw Szpilman struggles to survive the onslaught of Nazi tyranny during World War II in this drama based on his memoirs.

title: Bo Burnham: what.
synopsis: Left brain and right brain duke it out -- and ultimately belt out a melody -- in stand-up comedian Bo Burnham's quick and clever one-man show.

title: Tim Minchin And The Heritage Orchestra Live
synopsis: Flanked by a full orchestra, Tim Minchin takes the Royal Albert Hall by storm with a wonderfully witty evening of satirical musical comedy.

title: Punjab 1984
synopsis: During a time of political turmoil, a mother goes on a journey in search of her missing son, who has been misjudged and labeled a terrorist.

title: Senna
synopsis: This fast-paced documentary profiles Ayrton Senna, one of the greatest drivers in the history of Formula One racing, and a hero in his native Brazil.

title: Bill Hicks: Sane Man
synopsis: Filmed in 1989 at a turning point in comedian Bill Hicks's career, this rare onstage performance captures him spouting off on a variety of topics.

title: Louis C.K.: Hilarious
synopsis: Emmy-winning comedy writer Louis C.K. brings his caustic wit to Milwaukee, offering up his unique and uncensored take on sex, parenting and more.

title: Eh Janam Tumhare Lekhe
synopsis: Driven by the lessons he learned from his mother, and the values of the Sikh religion, a man sets out on a mission to serve humanity.

title: Interrogation
synopsis: In this fact-based drama, politically motivated cops in Andhra Pradesh set out to frame four Tamil laborers for a crime, torturing them to no avail.

title: Springsteen on Broadway
synopsis: Bruce Springsteen shares personal stories from his life and acoustic versions of some of his best-known songs in an intimate one-man show.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
synopsis: Superheroes amass to stop intergalactic sociopath Thanos from acquiring a full set of Infinity Stones and wiping out half of all life in the universe.

title: Qismat
synopsis: A young villager moves to Chandigarh and falls for his bubbly neighbor, but their love story is affected by several heartbreaking twists of fate.

title: Masoom
synopsis: A loving husband and father's joyful family life is rocked to its core upon the discovery that he has a young son borne from a past extramarital affair.

title: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way
synopsis: Bill Burr escapes the zombie apocalypse, explores how rom-coms ruin great sex and explains how too many childhood hugs may be the downfall of man.

title: Django Unchained
synopsis: Accompanied by a German bounty hunter, a freed slave named Django travels across America to free his wife from a sadistic plantation owner.

title: Bill Burr: Let It Go
synopsis: The musings of comedian Bill Burr are let loose in this special, which was filmed at the historic Fillmore Auditorium in San Francisco.

title: Rush: Beyond the Lighted Stage
synopsis: Celebrate the remarkable 40-year career of influential Canadian rockers Rush with this documentary, which details the band's formation and evolution.

title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
synopsis: When Indiana Jones is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.

title: Winter on Fire
synopsis: Over 93 days in Ukraine, what started as peaceful student demonstrations became a violent revolution and full-fledged civil rights movement.

title: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
synopsis: Combining his trademark wit and self-deprecating humor with original music, Bo Burnham offers up his unique twist on life in this stand-up special.

title: Taare Zameen Par
synopsis: When daydreamer Ishaan is sent to boarding school, an unconventional art teacher tries to help the imaginative student discover his true identity.

title: The Wishing Tree
synopsis: Five children living on the edge of a forest band together to save a magical wishing tree from destruction and find their own paths to happiness.

title: Dangal
synopsis: A once-promising wrestler pursues the gold medal he never won by training two of his daughters to compete at the Commonwealth Games.

title: Love Ni Bhavai
synopsis: Not romantically inclined, a popular radio personality finds herself caught between two diametrically opposed suitors.

title: Skydancers
synopsis: Only a few women pilots take part in the sport of aerobatics. Director Fredric Lean captures their powerful spirit at the World Aerobatic Championships.

title: Harishchandrachi Factory
synopsis: Against a backdrop of burgeoning social unrest, a neophyte filmmaker makes history in 1913 as the director of India's first feature-length film.

title: Life in the Doghouse
synopsis: A couple operates a bustling dog rescue out of their own home, vowing to give a safe space to the neediest pups on the planet -- 10,000 and counting.

title: Super Deluxe
synopsis: Sex, stigma and spirituality merge in these eccentric stories of an angsty teenager, an unfaithful wife and a transgender woman returning to her past.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
synopsis: After being bitten by a radioactive spider, Brooklyn teen Miles Morales gets a crash course in web-slinging from his alternate-dimension counterparts.

title: 3 Idiots
synopsis: While attending one of India's premier colleges, three miserable engineering students and best friends struggle to beat the school's draconian system.

title: Chupke Chupke
synopsis: Jealous of the high regard in which his new wife holds their brother-in-law, a botany professor stages an elaborate prank that will even the score.

title: Sadma
synopsis: After a traumatic injury leaves her with amnesia and age regression, a young woman is sold to a brothel before a teacher becomes her savior.

title: Inglourious Basterds
synopsis: A Jewish cinema owner in occupied Paris is forced to host a Nazi premiere, where a group of American soldiers called the Basterds plans a face-off.

title: Taxi Driver
synopsis: While looking out for a misguided child prostitute, an unhinged cabbie descends into madness while grappling with society’s moral decline.

title: Bill Burr: You People Are All the Same
synopsis: Funnyman Bill Burr takes the stage to uncork a profanity-laced, incisive routine that pokes fun at plastic surgery, reality TV, gold diggers and more.

title: Cowspiracy
synopsis: Learn how factory farming is decimating the planet's natural resources -- and why this crisis has been largely ignored by major environmental groups.

title: Esperando La Carroza
synopsis: Cora has three sons and a daughter and she´s almost 80. One day during a family reunion the big question comes up: who will be her heir?

title: Sairat
synopsis: When two college students -- a rich man’s daughter and a fisherman’s son – defy social edicts by falling in love, violence erupts in their village.

title: Thithi
synopsis: In a South Indian village, a centenarian's funeral brings together his free-spirited son, inheritance-hungry grandson and girl-crazy great-grandson.

title: Hasan Minhaj: Homecoming King
synopsis: Comic Hasan Minhaj of 'The Daily Show' shares personal stories about racism, immigrant parents, prom night horrors and more in this stand-up special.

title: Hannah Gadsby: Nanette
synopsis: Australian comic Hannah Gadsby reshapes standard stand-up by pairing punchlines with personal revelations on gender, sexuality and childhood turmoil.

title: The Bund
synopsis: After losing everything, a young man rebuilds his life and finds love in 1920s Shanghai -- all while rising to power in an organized crime syndicate.

title: Khosla Ka Ghosla
synopsis: A cranky control freak must rely on his comically dysfunctional family to pull off a scam on a greedy land shark who's stolen his prized property.

title: Tikli and Laxmi Bomb
synopsis: Two frustrated sex workers cut out the middlemen from their business affairs and start a cooperative that's run entirely by women.

title: Andhadhun
synopsis: A visually impaired pianist’s world careens into a series of shocking twists after he unintentionally lands at the murder scene of a former film star.

title: Taylor Swift reputation Stadium Tour
synopsis: Taylor Swift takes the stage in Dallas for the reputation Stadium Tour and celebrates a monumental night of music, memories and visual magic.

title: Joy
synopsis: Close to paying off her debts, a Nigerian sex worker in Austria coaches a reluctant novice, and assesses the risks of taking a faster path to freedom.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
synopsis: Young Ofelia meets a mythical faun who claims she is destined to become princess of the Underworld. But first she must carry out three perilous tasks.

title: Eddie Murphy: Delirious
synopsis: Flashing the wild stand-up comedy that made him a household name, Eddie Murphy unleashes uncensored observations and parodies in this 1983 live show.

title: Virunga
synopsis: The Oscar-nominated true story of the rangers risking their lives to save Africa's most precious national park and its endangered gorillas.

title: There Will Be Blood
synopsis: An ambitious prospector strikes it rich and turns a simple village into a boomtown, stoking the ire of a charismatic young preacher.

title: Searching for Sugar Man
synopsis: Decades after Detroit singer-songwriter Rodriguez disappeared following the commercial failure of his albums, two fans try to track down their idol.

title: John Mulaney: New in Town
synopsis: Stand-up comedian John Mulaney tackles such red-hot topics as quicksand, Motown singers and an elderly man he once met in a bathroom.

title: Swades: We, the People
synopsis: An Americanized NASA scientist returns to his native India on a business trip and searches for the nanny who helped raise him.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
synopsis: Two young men -- Prem and Amar -- are broke and have no concrete plans for the future when they discover that a stunning heiress lives nearby. Both Prem and Amar make it their mission to charm the young lady into marriage.

title: Rang De Basanti
synopsis: An idealistic English filmmaker casts a group of student actors in her docudrama about India's revolution against British rule in the 1920s.

title: Bill Burr: Paper Tiger
synopsis: Bill Burr unloads on outrage culture, male feminism, cultural appropriation, robot sex and more in a blistering stand-up special shot in London.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
synopsis: Accompanied by his father, Indiana Jones sets off on his third adventure to explore the cradle of civilization on a perilous hunt for the Holy Grail.

title: LA 92
synopsis: Previously unseen footage is shaped into a fresh and timely retelling of the 1992 Rodney King trial -- and the verdict that sparked civil unrest.

title: A Silent Voice
synopsis: A former class bully reaches out to the deaf girl he'd tormented in grade school. He feels unworthy of redemption but tries to make things right.

title: Guilty
synopsis: When a teen and her family's hired servant turn up dead, inept police bungle the inquiry and wind up fingering a controversial prime suspect.

title: 13TH
synopsis: In this thought-provoking documentary, scholars, activists and politicians analyze the criminalization of African Americans and the U.S. prison boom.

title: Richard Pryor: Live in Concert
synopsis: Richard Pryor's classic 1979 concert film has him discussing a wide range of topics, including race, the police and his favorite target -- himself.

title: Pink
synopsis: A sexual assault victim, unjustly tried for the attempted murder of her attacker, is defended by a retired lawyer who challenges India's rape culture.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Hindi Version)
synopsis: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Hindi conclusion to the historic saga.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Tamil Version)
synopsis: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Tamil conclusion to the historic saga.

title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion (Malayalam Version)
synopsis: To avenge his father's death, a young man leads an army into battle against a cruel tyrant in this Malayalam conclusion to the historic saga.

title: Cuba and the Cameraman
synopsis: Emmy-winning filmmaker Jon Alpert chronicles the fortunes of three Cuban families over the course of four tumultuous decades in the nation's history.

title: Story of an Egg
synopsis: When an astrologer gives him one year to find a mate or face being alone forever, a professor sets out to find a bride despite serious obstacles.

title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
synopsis: The Monty Python comedy clan skewers King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table as they quest far and wide for the Holy Grail.

title: Parrot Sketch Not Included: Twenty Years of Monty Python
synopsis: Presented by Steve Martin, this anthology draws from “Flying Circus” and “Fliegender Zirkus” to mark the 20th anniversary of the TV series.

title: Sudani from Nigeria
synopsis: When a soccer club manager brings one of his injured foreign players home to recuperate, they form an unlikely bond despite their cultural differences.

title: Paan Singh Tomar
synopsis: Paan Singh Tomar goes from celebrated runner to star brigand and rebel when life after sports fails to unfold as planned.

title: Bobby Robson: More Than a Manager
synopsis: Explore the life and times of legendary soccer manager Bobby Robson, whose keen mind for the game was matched only by his devotion to his teams.

title: Article 15
synopsis: The grim realities of caste discrimination come to light as an entitled but upright city cop ventures into India’s heartland to investigate a murder.

title: The Son
synopsis: In this psychological thriller, painter Lorenzo's life spirals out of control as he fears his wife is trying to isolate him from their infant son.

title: Klaus
synopsis: A selfish postman and a reclusive toymaker form an unlikely friendship, delivering joy to a cold, dark town that desperately needs it.

title: The Square
synopsis: This Emmy-winning, street-level view of the 2011 Egyptian Revolution captures the astonishing uprising that led to the collapse of two governments.

title: Blackfish
synopsis: This fascinating documentary examines the life of performing killer whale Tilikum, who has caused the deaths of several people while in captivity.

title: Jim Jefferies : BARE
synopsis: Nothing is sacred in this show from Australian comic Jim Jefferies, whether it’s the mother of his child, auditioning disabled actors, or gun control.

title: Muramba
synopsis: A young man and his parents ponder the reasons behind the recent breakdown of a relationship he was in -- and the possibility of reconciliation.
